title: Are students from cet quota and pessat quota mixed in the same class or do they have different classes? If they have different classes, are the teaching levels any different?

comments.body:
Only in the first semester PESSAT and CET may have different classes because admission times are different. From the next semester it is usually mixed. In the third semester when you go to your respective branches it's uniformly mixed according to SRNs. 
The only difference there may be is only because of the time constraint CET later rounds may have since the end semester exams are together for everyone. Teachers usually don't even know which class is which so there's no differentiation.
